translations.chinese: 項羽妒賢嫉能，有功者害之，賢者疑之，戰 勝而不與人功，得地而不與人利，此其所以失天下也。」
translations.english: Xiang Yu was jealous of the worthy and envious of the able. He harmed those with merit, doubted the worthy. He won battles but did not give credit to others, obtained land but did not share benefits with others. This is why he lost the world."

translations.chinese: 上曰：「公知其一，未知其二。
translations.english: The emperor said: "You know one aspect, but not the other.

translations.chinese: 夫運籌帷幄之中，決勝千里之外，吾不如子房；
translations.english: Planning strategy within the command tent, deciding victory a thousand miles away - I am not equal to Zifang.

translations.chinese: 填國家，撫百姓，給餉餽， 不絕糧道，吾不如蕭何；
translations.english: Filling the state treasury, comforting the people, providing supplies without interruption, maintaining the grain routes - I am not equal to Xiao He.

translations.chinese: 連百萬之眾，戰必勝，攻必取，吾不如韓信。
translations.english: Commanding a million troops, fighting must win, attacking must take - I am not equal to Han Xin.
